trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Vert for en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn er en spesiell den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>klassen som brukes til logisk vert celler som angir binær status.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: En DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>i hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>som går gjennom det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Hver celle leverer brukergrensesnittet (UI) som ligner på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Sorter standardmodus for denne kolonnetypen er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis er merket celleverdiene ment for lagring som andre data, eller til å utføre masseoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil svare straks når brukere klikker en avmerkingsboks-celle, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse, men denne hendelsen oppstår før celleverdien er oppdatert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger den nye verdien da klikke, ett alternativ er til å beregne hva forventet verdi vil bli basert på gjeldende verdi.

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to it.
trans-unit.target: Du lagre endringene umiddelbart og behandle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen for å svare på det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil lagre endringen når cellen klikkes, må du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: I et behandlingsprogram Hvis gjeldende celle er en avmerkingsboks-celle, kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"> </xref> klassen til standardstatusen.

trans-unit.source: Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av denne standardkonstruktør tilsvarer oppgir et argument i `false` til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"> </xref> og konfigurerer den for å vise avmerkingsboksene med to eller tre tilstander.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer kolonnen ved å angi følgende egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>|The value of the `threeState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| En ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>med egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>initialisert til den `threeState` parameterverdi. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>| Verdien for den `threeState` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| | Egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>-objektet som ble returnert av egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | Egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>-objektet som ble returnert av egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with three states; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with two states.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>skal vises merket med tre tilstander. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> skal vises merket med to tilstander.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som brukes til å opprette nye celler.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktører for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>klassen initialisere denne egenskapen til en nyopprettede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Endre egenskaper for celle malen umiddelbart påvirker ikke brukergrensesnittet (UI) med kolonnens eksisterende celler.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Endringene er bare synlige når kolonnen genereres (for eksempel ved å sortere kolonnen eller via et kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som alle celler i kolonnen er modellert etter.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er satt til en verdi som ikke er av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kolonnens standardstilen cellen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returneres av denne egenskapen har følgende første egenskapsverdiene: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` egenskapen | Standardverdien | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>Hvis egenskapen startverdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> `true`; ellers `false`. | Disse verdiene overstyre verdien angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll, men kan overstyres av en annen celle stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value of `false`, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>for objektet som returneres av egenskapen DefaultCellStyle har verdien `false`, endring av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>slik at du `true` automatisk satt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>har verdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, endring av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>slik at du `false` automatisk angir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes som standard.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den underliggende verdien tilsvarer en celleverdi av <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, som vises som en ukontrollert boks.

trans-unit.source: The FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>fastsetter tilknyttede verdiene i disse tilstander som de oppstår i den underliggende datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>for celle-objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer en verdi som behandler cellene i denne kolonnen som en <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> verdi.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir flate stil utseendet av cellene merket.

trans-unit.source: To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen å <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>kalle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden før <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> for å vise merket cellene med visuelle stiler

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>for celle-objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> verdi som angir utseendet til cellene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den underliggende verdien tilsvarer en ubestemt eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> celleverdi som vises som en avmerkingsboks for deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and IndeterminateValue properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, og IndeterminateValue fastsetter tilknyttede verdiene i disse tilstander som de oppstår i den underliggende datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>for celle-objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer en verdi som behandler cellene i denne kolonnen som en ubestemt verdi.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om vertsbaserte merket cellene tillater tre Kontroller statuser i stedet for to.

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden ubestemt kan for eksempel være nyttig når du ikke vil angi en standardverdi i avmerkingsboksen.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>for celle-objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value of `false`, changing the ThreeState property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen har en `false`, endre ThreeState egenskapsverdien til `true` automatisk satt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the ThreeState property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>har verdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, endre ThreeState egenskapsverdien til `false` automatisk angir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den vertsbaserte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> objekter er kan ha en tredje ubestemt, tilstand; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som beskriver kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver kolonnen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den underliggende verdien tilsvarer en celleverdi av <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, som vises som en avmerkede boks.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>fastsetter tilknyttede verdiene i disse tilstander som de oppstår i den underliggende datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>for celle-objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cell will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer en verdi som behandler cellen som en <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> verdi.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
